title: [RESOLVED] 10/3/2017 Stuck at Authenticating Isssues
body:
>#Update 3:12PM

> Results are looking positive for players being able to log in, so we're considering this resolved for now.  Thanks everyone for your patience.

------------------------------

>#Update 3:01PM

>Early word from network engineers is that the problem should be resolved.  Waiting a bit to call it just in case it's a false positive

------------------------------

>#Update 2:46 PM

>Still investigating.  Checked with team about chat issues, and they are likely a result of the same issue causing log ins to fail.  Gameplay shouldn't be impacted, but we're keeping an eye on things while we triage.

------------------------------

>#Update 2:21 PM

>We're still investigating potential root cause, but at the moment this does seem to be limited to players on the east coast. 

------------------------------

At about 1:30 PM Pacific Time our tech team started to notice a decent spike in players getting stuck trying to authenticate or log in to the client. We're aware of the issue and are looking into what's gone wrong. In the meantime, most players have had success using a VPN to solve any authentication problems, but this should only be used as a temporary solution.

replies.body: OMG I LOGGED ON!!!!!
Oh wait it was just my imagination :(
OK, now I'm actually able to log on :)
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} RIOT NEVER FAILS TO EXCITE

Alright my client was doing so weird stuff when I was able to log in. I put in a 25$ gift card code and bought santa braum and totemic maokai, please do not only fix the issue but make sure my purchases are ok because i got santa braum for a "my shop" deal and i dont want to not have it ;-;
This specific issue shouldn't affect any purchases, though definitely submit a ticket to player support if you happen to notice anything funky once you're able to log back in.
Lol I also brought stuff just before it crashed.
As did I
same i just bought a skin too and then i was disconnected during queue
how long will be fixed it
isnt there a way to set/reset/identify the dns host or the routing ip for riot requests to allow a different login server to be pinged...  anyone remember that post?
When would it be fixed? Also the VPN did not work for me, did it work for anybody?

So currently I've been logged on for several hours, now my chat will not connect nor can I invite my friend to play together. This is really causing issues for me, and then I can't even talk to players in a Pre-game lobby so it makes it hard to coordinate things... Plox fix the issue RITO...{{summoner:1}}
same
I even tried to invite you, lol. It would let me send your name through and invite you but it wouldn't do anything else.

Hey everyone, the team thinks they've been able to identify and solve the problem, so please let us know if you're still experiencing the same login error (stuck at authenticating, which eventually fails over to "Unexpected error occurred")
No, Im still stuck, also reopen client, still stuck

If you're still having issues, go ahead and contact Player Support.  It's possible that this is an unrelated issue with the same symptoms, though if the issue has returned/was not properly resolved, we'd definitely want to track it!
Done, is it fine if i didnt include the network analysis? (I had Java on, but still couldnt see start analysis)
I am still stuck at authenticating. This problem has been happening since last night around 6EST

This may be a separate issue with the same symptoms.  If you haven't already, I'd recommend contacting Player Support so they can take a look at your specific situation to see if it does happen to be related or if there's something else going on.
I FOUND SOMETHING THAT MIGHT BE IMPORTANT FOR YOU GUYS> All I did is change from wifi to ethernet. But, this might not be accurate because I didnt relog before connecting to ethernet.

I was able to get yesterday during the day and have a wired connection. I used the hextech repair tool and checked my ISP and my download speed was over 80mb/s and ping was 29 to your server. I also had no packet loss when using the repair tool
